name: Disfunction
description:
Disfunction -

 Less functions at a time is more danger and ultimately more fun.  

Made in one week for the 3rd BTP game jam.

Note: This game may be  a lil hard even in easy mode to play, but if you keep playing it it feels easier. Practice makes perfect as they say. And You will have a ton of fun along the way. (hopefully)

How to Play:

You play as a soldier, trying to kill as many robots as possible. Your suit Malfunctioned  so now you can olny use 1 of your 3 functions at a time. Your functions are shooting, moving sideways, and moving up and down. Less functions at a time is more danger and ultimately more fun.   Click on a function to use it. Once pressed, the function you were using before turns off. 

Controls:

Use  your mouse to rotate the player.

Use the mouse to click on the different functions.

Use the E Key to Shoot.

Use the WASD keys or arrow keys to move.

Everything in the game was made by a team that consisted of 3 ppl except for the music and sound effects which were taken from the Wowie pack.
